Title: Candy Cane Cocktail With Vanilla Vodka
Ingredients: 1 ¼ ounce white creme de cacao
Instructions: With a mallet, crush the candy canes into a powder leaving some pieces larger than others
Place in a small, flat dish large enough to accommodate the top of the martini or coupe glass
Moisten a paper towel with some vanilla vodka and run it along the rim of your martini or coupe glass
Dip the glass into the candy cane powder and set aside
To a cocktail shaker, add ice, vanilla vodka, white creme de cacao, and creme de menthe
Shake vigorously for 20 seconds
Strain and pour into the garnished glass
Serve immediately!

Title: Apple Cider Old Fashioned
Instructions: To a cocktail mixer, add half the ice; fill a rocks glass with remaining ice
To the mixer, add the rye, apple cider, and bitters
Stir for about 20 seconds to incorporate the ingredients and adequately chill the drink
Strain and pour into the ice-filled rocks glass
Garnish with an apple slice and cherries
Serve immediately

Title: Eggnog White Russian
Instructions: To a rocks glass, add your ice cube
Add the vodka and coffee liqueur, and stir gently
Pour the eggnog over the ice/vodka/coffee liqueur mixture
Sprinkle a dash of ground nutmeg on top
Serve immediately!

Title: Cranberry Moscow Mule
Instructions: Fill the copper mug with crushed ice
Add the lime juice, cranberry juice, and vodka
Give it a quick stir
Add the ginger beer and give another stir
Garnish with the sprig of rosemary, lime slice, and cranberries
Serve immediately

Title: Pumpkin Mule
Instructions: Fill a copper mug with the ice
Add the apple cider, pumpkin butter and vodka directly to the copper mug
Top with the ginger ale
Garnish with the thyme and cinnamon stick and serve immediately
Enjoy!

Title: Blackberry Bramble
Ingredients: 1 cup crushed ice plus more for your shaker
Instructions: Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice
To a cocktail shaker, add additional ice, gin, and lemon juice
Shake quickly and pour over the crushed ice in the rocks glass
Drizzle the crème de mûre over the back of a bar spoon to achieve a marbled effect
Drizzle the blueberry syrup over the back of a bar spoon to achieve the same effect
Garnish with blackberries and serve immediately

Title: Cranberry Mimosa
Instructions: To a champagne flute, add the Gran Gala, orange juice, and cranberry juice
Stir these ingredients together
Fill to the top with the prosecco
Add cranberries and rosemary for garnish
Serve immediately

Title: Lavender French 75
Instructions: Using a citrus juicer, begin to juice your lemons
To a cocktail shaker, add ice, lemon juice, gin and lavender simple syrup
Shake for approximately 20 seconds
Strain and pour the mixture into a champagne flute or coupe glass
Top with Prosecco and give a quick stir
Garnish with fresh lavender and serve right away

Title: Strawberry Mojito
Ingredients: 3 Wedges Lime plus more for garnish
10 Leaves Mint for drink and garnish
Instructions: Muddle the strawberries, lime juice, lime wedges and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker
Add rum and ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds
Pour directly into a glass with additional ice
Do not strain
Add the club soda and stir
Garnish with mint leaves, lime slices or wedges, or strawberries if desired
Serve immediately

Title: Pumpkin Spice Martini
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon Pumpkin pie spice for the rim
1 tablespoon Maple butter for the rim
Instructions: To a plate large enough to fit the rim of your martini glass, spread the maple butter, and dip the rim of your glass ensuring there is a thin layer of maple butter
To a plate large enough to fit the rim of your martini glass, add the pumpkin pie spice and dip/roll the maple buttered portion of the glass ensuring that the spice sticks to the maple butter
To a cocktail shaker, add ice, vanilla and pumpkin vodkas, and the rumchata
Shake for about 20 seconds, before straining and pouring into your maple and pumpkin spice rimmed glass
Serve immediately

Title: Apple Margarita
Ingredients: 1  cup ice plus more for your glass
Instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice
To a cocktail shaker, add ice, mezcal, triple sec, pear liqueur, apple cider, lime juice, apple jam, and one star anise
Shake vigorously for 20 seconds, strain and pour over ice in rocks glass
Garnish with apple slices and star anise
Serve immediately

Title: Caramel Apple Mimosa - The Perfect Holiday Cocktail
Instructions: Rim your glass with the caramel sauce, then roll or dip into the cinnamon and sugar mixture
Add the caramel vodka and apple cider to the glass and give a gentle stir
Fill the glass with the prosecco
Add the sliced apple for garnish
Serve immediately and enjoy!

Title: Angelo Azzurro
Instructions: Add ice to a cocktail shaker
Add the blue curacao, triple sec, and gin
Shake for approximately 20 seconds
Strain and pour into a martini or coupe glass
Twist and add the lemon peel as a garnish
Serve immediately

Title: Strawberry Lemonade Vodka
Instructions: Add ice to a cocktail shaker
If serving on the rocks, add the ice to the serving glass
Add the vodka, strawberry liqueur and lemonade
If using a shaker, shake for 20 seconds and then strain and pour into a glass
If serving on the rocks, stir the ingredients
If serving on the rocks, fill to the top with club soda or seltzer
Garnish with your choice of strawberries and/or lemon slices

Title: Pumpkin Spice Bourbon Milk Punch
Instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
To the shaker add the bourbon, Rumchata, milk, and vanilla extract
Next, add the honey and shake vigorously for about 20 seconds
Strain and pour into ice-filled rocks glasses
Top with pumpkin pie spice and serve immediately

Title: Limonata Basil Cocktail
Instructions: Add lemon slices, cucumber slices and basil leaves to a cocktail shaker and muddle ingredients together
Add Vodka and ice
Shake for 20 seconds
Strain and pour into a coupe glass, or over ice into a rocks glass
Add the Limonata and seltzer
Also, add orange bitters to the top, if using
Garnish with a basil leaf and cucumber slice
Serve immediately, and enjoy!

Title: Apple Pie A La Mode Martini
Instructions: Combine the cinnamon and sugar
Set aside
Add ice, ice cream and cider to a blender
If using vodka, add at this time as well
Blend for about 15 seconds until ice is incorporated and the mixture is nice and frothy
Pour mixture into chilled coupe glasses
Top with a splash of club soda
Garnish with the apple slice and cinnamon/sugar mixture as shown
Serve immediately

Title: Oliveto Cocktail
Ingredients: ½ ounce  extra virgin olive oil
Instructions: To a cocktail shaker, add the gin, licor 43, olive oil, lemon juice, simple syrup and egg white
"Dry shake" the ingredients for 30 seconds
To the shaker, add the 2 ice cubes and continue shaking vigorously until the ice is fully dissolved and you can no longer hear it clinking
Pour the contents from the shaker into a coupe, martini, or wine glass
Allow the foam to rise to the top and serve immediately

Title: Sherbet Punch
Ingredients: 4 scoops Rainbow Sherbet plus more for garnish
Instructions: To a pitcher or punch bowl, add 4 scoops of sherbet
Add the frozen raspberries
Add the vodka
Add the sparkling wine and seltzer
Stir and serve, adding an extra small scoop of sherbet to each glass (optional)

Title: Limoncello Spritz
Instructions: Add ice to a glass of your choice
Add the limoncello, followed by the prosecco and club soda
Stir the ingredients
Add garnishes of mint and lemon, if desired
Serve immediately
